project.name: J-C412A-LUCE-05-ST02-DT03-DF07-CF26-01
project.description: This test takes a filename that is used as a representation of an externally accessible and unrestricted mutex lock. The weakness will then attempt to grab this lock by checking for the files existence, and creating the file if it doesn't exist. If the file does exist, the weakness will hang until it is deleted, indefinitely.

iopair.name: J-C412A-LUCE-05-ST02-DT03-DF07-CF26-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: index a single file Environment variable defining string value.

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND GOOD-02 AND GOOD-03 AND GOOD-04 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

output_checks.simple_check: if [[ -a ../testData/good-01-index/_0.cfe ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
if [[ -a ../testData/good-01-index/_0.cfs ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;

process.file: data1 data2 data3 data4 data5 data6 data7

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_Yyivw8CH8c3my6LfiTSy AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_ajTUk19lAk OR (NOT finished_zk8QtgJSP7 AND NOT (controlled_exit_VuD6BN9XP0 OR continued_execution_EWvd9iq0W6)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_ajTUk19lAk OR (NOT finished_zk8QtgJSP7 AND NOT (controlled_exit_VuD6BN9XP0 OR continued_execution_EWvd9iq0W6))))))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_ajTUk19lAk OR (NOT finished_zk8QtgJSP7 AND NOT (controlled_exit_VuD6BN9XP0 OR continued_execution_EWvd9iq0W6)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_ajTUk19lAk OR (NOT finished_zk8QtgJSP7 AND NOT (controlled_exit_VuD6BN9XP0 OR continued_execution_EWvd9iq0W6)))))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "File Created" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
